input.sentences: we gathered for [male] 's surprise party at the restaurant .
we got the signal that he was in the parking lot .
we lit all the candles and got the cameras ready .
[male] 's face will tell you how he feels about surprises .
eventually he came around and joined in the fun . everyone had a great time .
output.sentences: A group of friends gathered at a restaurant.
The cake was forgotten in the parking lot.
After it was retreived the friends lit some candles.
And celebrated with a male they just met.
The male had a ton of fun.
